entry.title: $2299 // EXTREMELY SPACIOUS PAD! SEPARATE LIVING ROOM! CLOSET SPACE! HEAT !!
entry.content:
BROOKLIV IS NOW INTRODUCING A GORGEOUS RENOVATED EXCLUSIVE TWO BEDROOM APARTMENT WITH HUUUGE BEDROOMS AND A SPACIOUS SEPARATE LIVING ROOM IN A GREAT BUILDING IN THE HOTTEST AREA OF BED-STUY!!! THIS UNIT ALSO HAS A BRAND NEW MODERN TILED BATHROOM WITH A TUB. THE ENTIRE UNIT IS FLOWING WITH NATURAL SUN LIGHT!!!

*Please Provide CELL Number For Best Communication*

Amenities:
Modern kitchen with FULL appliances
Spacious SEPARATE living room
Fully tiled bathroom with a TUB
TWO Spacious QUEEN Size bedrooms
Tons of natural sun light
Hardwood floors throughout the apartment!
Live-in Super

Right near TONZ nice restaurants, shops, grocery stores, bars and much more!

Right by the A,C,S,2,3,4, and 5 trains; a ride to Manhattan in minutes!

Also minutes from the Franklin Ave Shuttle.

***HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED***

***PETS ALLOWED***
***NO FEE***
***GUARANTORS WELCOME***


Call or email today for a PRIVATE showing before it's GONE!!!!
